item.title: DROID takes the Android to a new level
item.description: DROID sales in the USA and the robo-promotional ads from Verizon has boosted Android sales, so much so that hits on my blog have started to double since the new phone went on sale. Stats are good â€“ Top searchs on Best Apps are going to my posts for Top Android Apps and 2 top Android apps from Google.
